name: Insectroid
description:
Insectroid is my 3D shooter study project.

I made the following modifications to the project template:

  • Added title screen
  • Created game logo
  • Re-styled main menus
  • Added UI animations
  • Re-styled pause, game over and victory screens
  • Re-styled in game UI (HUD)
  • Created unique level 2

Created By KCA

Controls:
WASD to move
Space bar to jump and double jump
Click to shoot
Scroll wheel or number 1 to cycle weapons
